Package com.jgaap.eventDrivers

Class Summary
_23LetterWordEventDriver N.b use of _ to mark class name beginning with digit.
_24LetterWordEventDriver N.b use of _ to mark class name beginning with digit.
_34LetterWordEventDriver N.b use of _ to mark class name beginning with digit.
BlackListEventDriver Filters all Event strings against named file and removes named events.
CharacterBiGramEventDriver Extract bigrams of characters as features.
CharacterEventDriver This event set is all individual characters, as determined by the preprocessing applied in the previous stage.
CharacterNGramEventDriver Extract character N-grams as features.
CharacterTetraGramEventDriver Extract character 4-grams as features.
CharacterTriGramEventDriver Extract character trigrams as features.
CoarsePOSTagger  
DefinitionsEventDriver  
DisLegomenaEventDriver This event set is all events occurring only twice of an underlying event model (parameterized as underlyingevents)
FirstWordInSentenceEventDriver  
FreqEventDriver Corpus frequencies taken from English Lexicon Project.
HapaxLegomenaEventDriver This event set is all events occurring only once of an underlying event model * (parameterized as underlyingevents)
HDLegomenaEventDriver This event set is all events occurring only once of an underlying event model * (parameterized as underlyingevents)
MNLetterWordEventDriver This event set is all "words" (NaiveWordEventDriver) with M <= length <= N (M and N being parameters "M" and "N" respectively)
MWFunctionWordsEventDriver Uses function words as defined by Mosteller-Wallace in their Federalist papers study.
NaiveWordEventDriver Extract whitespace-separated words (including punctuation) as features.
NamingTimeEventDriver Naming times taken from English Lexicon Project.
NGramEventDriver This event set is N-grams (parameterized as N) of an underlying event model (parameterized as underlyingevents)
NullEventDriver Deprecated.
NumericTransformationEventDriver  
PartOfSpeechEventDriver This changes words into their parts of speech in a document.
PorterStemmerEventDriver Applies Porter's stemming algorithm (the Porter Stemmer) to produce just the stems of the underlying words or word sets.
PorterStemmerWithIrregularEventDriver  
POSBiGramEventDriver Extract bigrams of characters as features.
POSDecaGramEventDriver Extract bigrams of characters as features.
POSDodecaGramEventDriver Extract bigrams of characters as features.
POSEnneaGramEventDriver Extract bigrams of characters as features.
POSHendecaGramEventDriver Extract bigrams of characters as features.
POSHeptaGramEventDriver Extract bigrams of characters as features.
POSHexaGramEventDriver Extract bigrams of characters as features.
POSNGramEventDriver Extract POS N-grams as features.
POSOctaGramEventDriver Extract bigrams of characters as features.
POSPentaGramEventDriver Extract bigrams of characters as features.
POSTetraGramEventDriver Extract tetragrams of characters as features.
POSTriGramEventDriver Extract bigrams of characters as features.
POSTriskaidecaGramEventDriver Extract bigrams of characters as features.
RareWordsEventDriver This event set is all events occurring only once of an underlying event model * (parameterized as underlyingevents)
ReactionTimeEventDriver Reaction times taken from English Lexicon Project.
SentenceLengthWithWordsEventDriver  
SimpleAppendEventDriver Appends two or more underlying EventSets (parameterized as underlyingevents, a comma-separated list of EventDrivers) into one EventSet.
SuffixEventDriver Calculates N (parameter) character suffix of Events, useful for extracting English suffixes like "-tion" or "-er" or "-est." Of course, it also works on other languages.
SyllableTransitionEventDriver Extract syllable bigrams as features.
TransformationEventDriver Transforms Event strings for other Event Strings in generation.
TruncatedEventDriver Truncates Events to shorter strings -- i.e.
TruncatedFreqEventDriver Truncate lexical frequency for discrete binning
TruncatedNamingTimeEventDriver Truncate lexical frequency for discrete binning
TruncatedReactionTimeEventDriver Truncate lexical frequency for discrete binning
TumblingNGramEventDriver This event set is N-grams (parameterized as N) of an underlying event model (parameterized as underlyingevents).
V23LetterWordEventDriver N.b use of _ to mark class name beginning with digit.
V24LetterWordEventDriver Extract vowel-initial words with 2 or 3 letters as features
V34LetterWordEventDriver Extract vowel-initial words with 3 or 4 letters as features
VowelInitialWordEventDriver This event set is all "words" (NaiveWordEventDriver) beginning with vowels "aeiouAEIOU"; extension may be necessary to include non-English vowels or characters with diacritical marks like Danish ae digraph or German o-umlaut
VowelMNLetterWordEventDriver Extract vowel-initial words with between M and N letters as features
WhiteListEventDriver Filters all Event strings against named file and removes unlisted events.
WordBiGramEventDriver Extract word bigrams as features.
WordLengthEventDriver Extract number of characters in each word as features.
WordNGramEventDriver Extract character N-grams as features.
WordSyllablesEventDriver This event set is the number of syllables in a given word, defined (naively) by the number of vowel clusters.
WordTetraGramEventDriver Extract 4-grams of words as features.
WordTriGramEventDriver Extract tri-grams of words as features.
